name: FurrionAwnCommand™
0:
”Alexa, Open Bedroom Shade”
”Alexa, Close Bedroom Shade”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can use Alexa to control all your Furrion devices! You can open/close your awning simply by giving orders to Alexa. Alexa can show you the stream from supported devices. 1. Download the Fruuion app from the App Store or Google Play Store. 2. Create an account and log in to your Furrion app. 3. Add your device to the Furrion app. 4. Go to the device setting, and click the 'Enable Alexa' button. 5. Open your Alexa app and search skill Furrion, and use the same account to log in. 5. Alexa will discover your device. 6. say, 'Alexa open my shade' to control your Furrion device by Alexa.
